# PHAccessLevel.readWrite

**Case**

A value that indicates the app can read from and write to the user’s photo library.

## Declaration

```swift
case readWrite
```

## Access Levels

- **PHAccessLevel.addOnly**: A value that indicates the app may only add to the user’s photo library.
